title: Garmin Mapsource Topo Poland v.0806
description:
Topo PL 100 v.0806 is, to be perfectly clear, very much a work in progress.  That being said, it is clear that a lot of work has been done with some excellent results.  This is the 2008-06 release of this software.

Topo PL 100 are Garmin Mapsource maps that cover roughly a third of Poland.  Some areas have better coverage - trails (routable!), POI&#039;s and detailed land cover (forest, scrub, reserves, wetlands, etc.) - and other areas have just the basic topographical coverage, e.g. contour lines and not much else.

These are repackaged from the original download, available here: <a href=" http://gpsmaniak.com/new/download-garmin-kod.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gpsmaniak.com/new/download-garmin-kod.htm</a>

...My version doesn&#039;t require you to know any Polish or make any guesses about what buttons mean what.  Just download, unpack into wherever the rest of your Garmin maps are (usually C:Garmin) and run the reg file.  If your maps aren&#039;t all in C:Garmin you&#039;ll need to edit the reg file before running it.  

If you aren&#039;t comfortable doing that sort of thing, download the author&#039;s original version.

Sorry that this is a bit, well, rough... but I challenge you to look around:  there are no other, better sets of topographical maps for Poland.

PS: Permission was asked from and granted by the author of this software to redistribute it here, on TPB.
